measure.CatchLine: Allows personal income taxpayers to subtract from taxable income amounts received from tax-exempt entity and paid toward mortgage loan in arrears, if during tax year taxpayer becomes unemployed and held position paying less than 80 percent of area median income.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Allows personal income taxpayers to subtract from taxable income amounts received from tax-exempt entity and paid toward mortgage loan in arrears, if during tax year taxpayer becomes unemployed and held position paying less than 80 percent of area median income. 
	Applies to payments received in tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2020, and before January 1, 2022. 
	Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to homeowners experiencing financial hardship; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to homeowners experiencing financial hardship; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
